properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, 'No Dept') AS DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) ORDER BY EMP_ID
INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, NULL, DEFAULT)

SELECT EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, 'No Dept') AS DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_ID = ?
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMAIL = ?, PHONE = ?, SALARY = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, 'No Dept') AS DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE DEPT_CODE = ? ORDER BY EMP_ID

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, 'No Dept') AS DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE SALARY > ? ORDER BY SALARY
SELECT NVL(DEPT_CODE, 'Department N/A') AS DEPT_CODE, SUM(SALARY) AS SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE GROUP BY DEPT_CODE ORDER BY DEPT_CODE

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, 'No Dept') AS DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = ?
SELECT JOB_NAME, ROUND(AVG(SALARY), 1) AS SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) GROUP BY JOB_NAME ORDER BY SALARY
